title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., "foo.txt").
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose Zip File to export.
4. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier, give the zip file a name (such as "test.zip"), and start the export.

Observed Behavior:
Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails. An error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during export, and the details specify that the file of the same name in project 2 is the problem.

Expected Behavior:
The export process should complete successfully without any errors or issues, allowing all files with the same name in different directories to be included in the zip file.

Steps to Reproduce:
Please follow the steps mentioned in the description to reproduce the issue.
